metadata.Title: CVE-2012-4752 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
appconfig.php in ownCloud before 4.0.6 does not properly restrict access,which allows remote authenticated users to edit app configurations viaunspecified vectors.  NOTE: this can be leveraged by unauthenticated remoteattackers using CVE-2012-4393.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-4752` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

owncloud - 4.0.7debian-1ubuntu1
owncloud-mysql - 4.0.7debian-1ubuntu1
owncloud-pgsql - 4.0.7debian-1ubuntu1
owncloud-sqlite - 4.0.7debian-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: owncloud package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.0.7debian-1ubuntu1').
